1.content:
You yawned as you got out of your bed and streatched, smiling as you looked outside to greet the new day. You got up and put on your clothes, a cut e little skirt that showed off your butt a little and a tanktop, as well as your size 12 feet You went down stairs of yoru aprtment and made your self breakfast.

Once finished with your meal of Carrot flavored cereal (a favorite among bunny girls) You decided it was a nice day for a walk, so you went outside and took in the fresh air. You loved nature so very much, the feel of grass on your toes, the wind in your hair and ears. It felt great, knowing that you were still alive to see it all.

"Looking beautiful as ever, my little treat." Your calm was broken by the voice of Jericho, the Wolf-Boy who lived next door to you. He was in his late 20's and had been telling you since you were kids that oneday he was going to have you in chains, sucking his cock for the rest ofyour life. You let out a sigh and turned around. "MOrning Jericho." You admited he was handsome. He was half-anthro like you and not full Furry. He had a strong musular build, Black hair on his chest and head, which atop there were two wolf ears and coming out his butt was a long fluffy wolf tail. If it weren't for his desire to enslave you, you would have a crush on him, though you sometimes catch yourself fantasizing about being in chains and being forced to suck his cock.

"So is today the day, my cute little bunny? Are you ready to submit to me?" He said half joking, he did so every morning. Despite his desires, he was still your friend in a sense.

"Hehe not today Jericho. I'm still enjoying being a free girl."
1.title: Surviving abother day

11.content:
Jericho moans and sighs. You chuckle some. Admittedly you kind of lime this morning routine. Being able to get one up on the wolf boy was nice. He finally sighs.

"Well.... okay.... change of tactics. How about lunch later? I could make you a tasty carrot souffle." He said. You chuckle. Here we go again.

"Trying to catch flies with honey again? " you ask, now in a perfectly giddy mood. Jericho blushes. For a rampaging all powerful wolf who wants to enslave you as his sex slave... he is as he always is, a big softie with a cannibalistic sense of humor.

"Is it working?" He asks. You smile and say...
11.title: Catching Flies With Honey

112.content:
You cannot explain it. Somehing in thebway he is asking has you transfixed. You stare into his eyes and suddenly your imagining yourself as his slave. He knows it. You know it. He has you this time.

"Like a charm." You admit, blushing. He smiles and approches.

"Then dont be late. Be prompt at one, and bring your appetites." He placed an armband on you and gives your neck a nom. The armband is to remiand you of your "date", while thebnom hgives a hint of what is to come. More than likely this will be your last day on this world, knowing wolves.

It isnt until sometime later you realize that. F***. Here all your life you avoided being food, and he just asks you to lunch and your practically screaming eat me?! Whwt was it? The way he asked? Those eyes?


Ah well, there are worse preds. Better set your affairs in order though. So, where to to get ready?
112.title: "*giggle* Like a charm." (friendly)

info.brief_description: You are a tasty looking Bunnygirl Anthro. Try to survive the day without being on the menu
info.description:
You are a cute 18 year old Bunny-Girl Half-Anthro named Mandy. You look mostly human, with long blonde hair, a tight shaped body with big breasts and well toned skin. You're feet are larger than most girls, being a bunny girl, you have large size 12 feet. However, you also have Long white bunny ears on top of your head instead of human ears and you have a little cotton tail sticking out of your cute little butt.

Oh and you are pretty much on the menu for other Anthros and Half-Anthros 24/7 as in this world, Vore and Cannibalism are both very much legal and Bunny-Girls are condisdered among the most delicious creature next to humans. Growing up was tough as you almost always had to spend every day avoiding getting picked off by a predator while living out your day to day life. Your sisters weren't as fortunate as they all met their fates on the dinner table. One was made into a nice bunny stew, one was served over rice and another baked into a bunny-girl pie with a few other bunny-girls.

Bunny-Girls are also highly regarded among everyone as making great slaves, both sexual and labor wise. To make matters even worse, your whole life you've had to deal with the neighbor Wolf-Boy licking his lips at you and telling you when you come of age, you would be his slave.

Will you survive another day? Or will you end up adorning some lucky pred's dinner table? Or perhaps end up in chains doing your master's bidding for the rest of your days?
